C:/Users/Deepak/Projects/EvolveNetworks/GA/massActionNetwork.h

00001 /********************************************************************************************************
00002 
00003 Copyright (C) 2009 Deepak Chandran
00004 
00005         This file defines a chemical reaction network using mass-action kinetics. The functions in this file
00006         are designed to be used with the GA library that I have written. 
00007         
00008         This file defines the following functions that are required in the GA:
00009                 1) a struct that represents an "individual"
00010                 2) a mutation function to randomly alter an individual
00011                 3) a crossover function to make a new individual from two individuals
00012         
00013         In addition, the file defines:
00014                 1) ODE function to simulate a network
00015                 2) Propensity function to simulate a network stochastically
00016         
00017         The program using this file must define:
00018                 1) a function that returns the fitness of a network
00019                 
00020 *********************************************************************************************************/
00021 
00022 #ifndef MASS_ACTION_FOR_GA
00023 #define MASS_ACTION_FOR_GA
00024 
00025 #include <stdio.h>
00026 #include <stdlib.h>
00027 #include <math.h>
00028 #include "ga.h"
00029 #include "mtrand.h"
00030 #include "cvodesim.h"   //for ODE simulation
00031 #include "ssa.h"        //for stochastic simulation
00032 
00036 typedef struct
00037 {
00038         int * r1;    //first reactant (can be -1 if none)
00039         int * r2;    //second reactant (can be -1 if none)
00040         int * p1;    //first product (can be -1 if none)
00041         int * p2;    //second product (can be -1 if none)
00042         double * k;  //rate constant for each reaction
00043         int reactions;    //number of reactions;
00044         int species;    //number of species;
00045 } 
00046 MassActionNetwork;
00047 
00048 /*****************************************************
00049    @name  Functions needed by GA
00050 ******************************************************/
00051 
00056 void deleteMassActionNetwork(GAindividual individual);
00057 
00062 GAindividual cloneMassActionNetwork(GAindividual individual);
00063 
00070 GAindividual crossoverMassActionNetwork(GAindividual individualA, GAindividual individualB);
00071 
00077 GAindividual mutateMassActionNetwork(GAindividual individual);
00078 
00079 /*****************************************************
00080    @name  Functions for simulating and printing the network defined above
00081 ******************************************************/
00089 void ratesForMassActionNetwork(double,double*,double*,GAindividual);
00090 
00096 double * stoichiometryForMassActionNetwork(GAindividual);
00097 
00102 void printMassActionNetwork(GAindividual);
00103 
00104 /*****************************************************
00105     @name Functions for initializing a GA
00106 ******************************************************/
00107 
00114 void setParametersForMassActionNetwork(double , double , double );
00120 void setSizeForMassActionNetwork(int,int);
00126 void setMutationAndCrossoverRatesForMassActionNetwork(double, double);
00132 GApopulation randomMassActionNetworks(int);
00139 MassActionNetwork * newMassActionNetwork(int,int);
00140 
00141 #endif
